articles.description: According to the microblogging site the roll-out is currently available for some iOS users and will soon come for Android users as well.
articles.content:
Twitter is in the process of testing a new CC button to turn captions on and off on videos with captions available, the social media giant announced.
According to the microblogging site the roll-out… [+1034 chars]

articles.title: New broadband plans from Reliance Jio; phones from Samsung, Realme, Xiaomi; Apple Watch’s free repair programm - Gadgets Now
articles.description: The week saw several smartphone launches across price bands. Realme launched its premium phone, Realme GT 2; Samsung launched a mid-range smartphone and premium smart TV; Xiaomi launched two new Redmi 10 series phones. Jio announced new broadband plans, Apple…
articles.content: Vivo slashed the price of two of its Y-series smartphones in India. Vivo Y33s and Vivo T33T have a price drop of Rs 1,000 each. Launched in 2021, Vivo Y33s comes with a price tag of Rs 18,990. The sm… [+270 chars]
